title: After a full night charge, the Pixel 4XL shows 78% charge. After rebooting, it writes 50% and does
content: Reboot doesn't help.  Changing charging, cables does not help.  In the off state, the phone also does not charge.  At around 50%, the charge stands and does not decrease for a long time.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
